oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A letter from Bert Garner to his sister-in-law, Mrs. L. H. Garner
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garner, Herbert Solomon;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Garner, Herbert Solomon; Garner, Letitia Hastings; Maryville (Tenn.); Pomona (Calif.);
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this letter to his sister-in-law, Bert Garner covers a wide range of topics, from the adventures of Cortez, to cousins and their happenings, to being relieved of the yoke of matrimony from his wife, whom he refers to as "Mote."
